attributes.action: Stop all Executive salaries until they return to Stormont
attributes.additional_details: Anyone who doesn't do their job doesn't get paid.  SF and DUP have no incentive to getting back to work because they're being paid for nothing.  Their inactiveness is holding Northern Ireland back and important decisions are being left because these 2 parties can't put their differences aside and get on with the job.  If they can't leave the past in the past, they need to step down and let someone else actually do the job they're meant to be doing
attributes.background: Stop SF and DUP wages until they start doing their job, if they don't go to work, don't pay them

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Since 28 October all ministers of the Northern Ireland Executive automatically ceased to hold office, so there no-one is receiving an Executive salary.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to stop the salary of MLAs of parties who refuse to nominate ministers, if that's what you want to happen.
